publicationStmt.p: Digital edition hosted on and GitHub:

bibl.title: Interest in People
bibl.ref: Article That Supplied Information for Markup

body.desc: This Banksy art piece shows a salesman with an aim to attack the a capitalist society where respect for people can often be viewed as less important than commodities. The graffiti lasted only a couple of days before it was painted over by store staff. It shows that he wants people to underatnd other human beings as well.

p.title: Interest in People, Banksy
p.credit: By: David Tooping from Toronto Ontario, https://torontoist.com/2010/05/banksy_comes_to_toronto/
